headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Speech Needs Some Asterisks
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Speech Needs Some Asterisks

docs.snippet: An annotated version of Donald Trump's speech on combatting terrorism would be heavy with asterisks. The presumptive GOP nominee's speech Monday painted a picture of a nation overrun by terrorists and with cowed leaders — including the State...
docs.lead_paragraph: An annotated version of Donald Trump's speech on combatting terrorism would be heavy with asterisks. The presumptive GOP nominee's speech Monday painted a picture of a nation overrun by terrorists and with cowed leaders — including the State Department under Hillary Clinton's leadership — doing little to keep them out. The reality is far more complex.

headline.main: Man Arrested in Colorado for Houston-Area Decapitation Death
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested in Colorado for Houston-Area Decapitation Death

docs.snippet: A man has been arrested in Colorado in connection with the slaying of a Southeast Texas man whose decapitated body was found about six weeks ago in his truck near a boat ramp....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man has been arrested in Colorado in connection with the slaying of a Southeast Texas man whose decapitated body was found about six weeks ago in his truck near a boat ramp.

headline.main: Thousands Attend Vigils Around US for Orlando Victims
headline.print_headline: Thousands Attend Vigils Around US for Orlando Victims

docs.snippet: Thousands have turned out for vigils, rallies and marches around the country for the victims of the deadly attack at a gay nightclub in Orlando. The events come during Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Pride Month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands have turned out for vigils, rallies and marches around the country for the victims of the deadly attack at a gay nightclub in Orlando. The events come during Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Pride Month.

headline.main: London Sings in Honor of Orlando Victims

docs.snippet: Hundreds of people gathered around Soho’s Old Compton Street for a minute of silence to honor victims of the Orlando, Fla., massacre. At the vigil, the London Gay Men’s Chorus sang “Bridge Over Troubled Water.”...

byline.original: By NATALIA V. OSIPOVA and MEGAN SPECIA

docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of people gathered around Soho’s Old Compton Street for a minute of silence to honor victims of the Orlando, Fla., massacre. At the vigil, the London Gay Men’s Chorus sang “Bridge Over Troubled Water.”

headline.main: Novo Diabetes Drug Cuts Heart Risks by 13 Percent in Key Trial
headline.print_headline: Novo Diabetes Drug Cuts Heart Risks by 13 Percent in Key Trial

docs.snippet: Novo Nordisk's top-selling diabetes drug Victoza cut the risk of heart attack, stroke and cardiovascular death by 13 percent in a closely watched study that may help boost sales of the injectable medicine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Novo Nordisk's top-selling diabetes drug Victoza cut the risk of heart attack, stroke and cardiovascular death by 13 percent in a closely watched study that may help boost sales of the injectable medicine.

headline.main: Polls Show Increasing Support for Brexit; Murdoch's Sun Backs 'Leave'
headline.print_headline: Polls Show Increasing Support for Brexit; Murdoch's Sun Backs 'Leave'

docs.snippet: Britain's "Leave" campaign opened up a 7-point lead over "Remain" ahead of a referendum on membership of the European Union an opinion poll showed late Monday, while the nation's biggest-selling newspaper urged readers to vote to quit the bloc....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's "Leave" campaign opened up a 7-point lead over "Remain" ahead of a referendum on membership of the European Union an opinion poll showed late Monday, while the nation's biggest-selling newspaper urged readers to vote to quit the bloc.

headline.main: Israel Elected to Head Permanent U.N. Committee for First Time
headline.print_headline: Israel Elected to Head Permanent U.N. Committee for First Time

docs.snippet: Israel on Monday won an election to chair the United Nations' legal committee, the first time that it will head one of the world body's six permanent committees since joining the U.N. in 1949....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel on Monday won an election to chair the United Nations' legal committee, the first time that it will head one of the world body's six permanent committees since joining the U.N. in 1949.

headline.main: Appeals Court Sides With Boeing in Whistleblower Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Sides With Boeing in Whistleblower Lawsuit

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court has sided with Boeing and one of its suppliers in the whistleblower lawsuit brought by three ex-workers at the aircraft manufacturer's former plant in Wichita....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court has sided with Boeing and one of its suppliers in the whistleblower lawsuit brought by three ex-workers at the aircraft manufacturer's former plant in Wichita.
